Topics¶

Topics is the term used to reference the metadata property that Project Open Data calls “theme”. The theme is the main thematic category of the dataset.

DKAN will create a data node for each theme specified in the datasets.

When the value of themes change or become outdated, the corresponding data node will be removed by the orphan_reference_processor queue task. If you prefer to run it manually, you may do so with:

drush queue-run orphan_reference_processor

DKAN2
